name: Menu Tamer
author: Avendi Media

sections.description:
Menu Tamer adds collapse/expand links to nav menu items in the WordPress admin interface. If you have a large navigation menu, managing it can become a frustrating task due to the sheer size it takes up. Menu Tamer lets you collapse any branch of a nav menu to get it out of the way.

Menu Tamer has been tested in the latest versions of Chrome, Safari, and Firefox, as well as Internet Explorer 7, 8, and 9 (understandably, it is much slower in IE, but it works).
sections.installation: Install via the WordPress plugin installer and activate. You’re done.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed a bug caused by script dependency issues

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Adds collapse/expand links to menu items to de-clutter the nav menu interface
description:

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: This upgrade fixes a bug in this program that prevents scripts from loading on the menus page in WordPress 3.5
